description: Creates a new user account with validation

params.name: username
params.description: Unique username for the new user

params.name: email
params.description: Email address for the new user

params.name: roles
params.description: Roles to assign to the user

response_fields.name: user_id
response_fields.description: Unique identifier for the created user

response_fields.name: created_at
response_fields.description: Timestamp when the user was created
